attr.value: If Rebuild the Town is played on this site it becomes an Oasis.
If Hold Rebuilt and Repaired is played on this site it becomes an Oasis.

card.name: Abur
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess while at or moving to asite in a Desert [e]. +2 EI against the Junast’s Guard faction. May not be in the company with overt characters.

card.name: Adûnaphel's Lute
card.text: Unique. Playable on Adûnaphel the Ringwraith at any non- Free-hold [F] site in the Sun-lands (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Adûnaphel; she gains the sage skill and is not taken to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. +2 to any CC from magic cards played by your characters at or moving to a site in the region of Adunaphel’s current site, or regions adjacent to this. Any CC made for spells or by opponent’s Man or Dúnadan characters in these regions is modified by -2. tap: during end-of-turn phase to take Heralded Lord or No Escape from My Magic from your discard pile to your hand.

card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Dúnedain. While you have Black Númenoreans in play Angamaite is a leader.

card.name: Araudagul
card.text: Unique. Half-troll. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +1 EI against Orcs. +2 EI against Orcs of the Ered Harmal faction.

card.name: Ard Once Vain
card.text: Place on Adûnaphel the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith; she becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Lugarlur; Adûnaphel gains this site as a home site. All your Dúnadan characters cost 1 less influence to control. Discard this card to take Adûnaphel’s Lute from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Arms of the Sea
card.text: Unique. Animal. Playable at Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopusesby a character with at least 7 prowess. May face up to 3 strikes ofan attack (in separate strike sequences); for each additional strike faced its prowess is modified by -2. If its controlling character is not an avatar your opponent makes a roll during your organization phase modified by -2; if the result is greater than his mind the controlling character is eliminated. tap: at any time if at an opponent’s new site to cancel the effects of Great Ship played on the company. Discard if his company moves to a non-Port site in a non-Costal Sea [c] region.

card.name: Army of the Southern Dragon
card.text: Unique. You may tap Akhôrahil to bring this card into play from your discard pile. You may play Hold Rebuilt and Repaired on any Shadow-hold [S] in Seznebab or its adjacent regions: rotate this card 90° (or place a token), such site becomes a Dark-hold [D] and is never discarded or returned to the location deck. If rotated 270°, this card is worth 2 mp and you may place any faction in play at these sites with your War-lord. This card is worth 4 mp if you have played Strife of War at a site in Sirayn or Curinshiban.

attr.value: Dune Sea, Ered Harmal, Lurmsakûn, Mirror of Fire, Siakan

Healing effects affect all characters at this site. Additionally, healing effects untap all tapped characters in the same company.

card.name: Call of the Desert
card.text: Corruption. Playable on a non-avatar character. Target character receives one CP and must make a CC at the end of the movement/hazard phase for each Desert [e] in his company’s site path (modified by -1 if the character has a home site in the Sun-lands). During the organization phase, target character may tap to attempt to remove this card by making a roll; discard this card if the result is greater than 6. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.text: Unique. +1 EI against Men. +2 EI against factions playable at Bozisha-Dar.

card.name: Clan Bulgan
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tûl Isra if the influence check is greater than 8. Turn this card face down if Clan Másra is in play and you have less mp than any hero opponent. Turn this card face up when you have more mp than any hero opponent. This card is worth 3 mp if Clan Masrá is eliminated.

card.name: Clan Másra
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tûl Isra if the influnece check is greater than 8. Turn this card face down if Clan Bulgan is in play and you have less mp than any minion opponent. Turn this card face up when you have more mp than any minion opponent. This card is worth 3 mp if Clan Bulgan is eliminated.

attr.value: Bay of Belfalas, Harondor, Hyrmenfalas, Mardruak Cape, Mardruak, Mouths of the Anduin

card.name: Cobras
card.text: Animals. Vermin. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses the first defending character. May also be played keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Border-hold [B] in the Central Plains or Sun-lands. May also be revealed as an on-guard creature at any site in the Central Plains, Gondor, Mordor or the Sun-lands, if you tap an agent at the site. Venomous Sting may be played immediately on a character wounded by Cobras (it may be taken from discard pile or sideboard).

card.name: Covshek-pust
card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Dune Sea orMirror of Fire, if the influence check is greater than 8.Standard Modifications: character with a home site in the Sun-lands (+2), overt character (-5), Men (+1). tap: treat either Dune Sea or Mirror of Fire as a single Desert [e] region for one of your moving companies this turn (not as a Deep Desert [ee]). tap: take one Desert Amber from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Cult of the Dark Lord
card.text: Unique. Black player only. Playable on a Dúnadan-hold,if you have a unique faction in play at the site. Place one of your characters (or a character taken Prisoner) at the site in your out of play pile. The site is considered a Darkhaven [K] for your companies. All automatic-attacks become normal attacks against other players’ companies. tap: bring one Man or Dúnadan character or creature (without asterix (*) from your discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle). Discard this card when the site leaves active play, or if you do not have a unique faction in play at the site.

card.name: Cult of Vatra
card.text: Unique. Playable if you have in play at least 3 Man factions playable at sites in the Sun-lands. All companies containing Elves, Dwarves or Wizards have their hazard limit increased by one. All influence attempts by such characters in the Sun-lands are modified by -3. You receive this card’s mp if you have played Smoke on the Wind at a Dwarf-hold or Elf-hold in the Sun-lands.

card.name: Dár
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +2 EI against Dwarves. tap: take one Dwarven Cunning from your discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: (1st) Undead — 5 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic- attack a non-unique Undead or Pûkel- creature from his hand.

card.name: Desert Amber
card.text: May only be a starting item if you start the game at a site in Bay of Ormal, Sun-lands or Utter South territories. A character with a home site in these territories may tap and discard this item to heal a character from wounded to tapped. Alternatively, discard this item to allow its bearer to attempt to remove a corruption card on him regardless of the bearer’s status.

card.name: Desert Orcs
card.text: Playable at a tapped or untapped Orc-hold in a Desert [e] region or Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Deep Desert [e e] region if the influence check is greater than 8. tap: allow an overt company moving through a Desert region [e] to move 1 extra region. tap: cancel the effects of The Sun Shone Fiercely for one of your companies at or moving to a site in the Sunlands and containing an Orc.Cannot be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Desert Screamers
card.text: Unique. Playable at any hidden site in the Sun-lands,if you discard a Treasure item from the company, and if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: female sages (+2)This faction is also considered an Elf faction. tap: add either Elf or Man type to any Slayer creature attack against a company in the Sun-lands; if such creature is defeated it is always placed in opponent’s mp and gives full mp. If such creature eliminates a character add a token to this card. This faction is worth +1 mp for each token.

card.name: Dolin
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. +1 prowess against Orcs.

card.name: Drought
card.text: Environment. All attacks keyed to a Desert [e] region or at sites in a Desert region receive +1 prowess. All factions in play at sites in a Desert region are worth 1 less mp (to a minimum of 1). River cannot be played on a site in a Desert. For every copy of either Sun or Drought in play any region adjacent to a Desert region is also considered a Desert region.Discard Drought if the Reach of Ulmo comes into play.

card.text: Environment. Each player may bring one Storms of Össe, Drowning Seas, or a creature normally keyable to Coastal Sea [c] from his discard pile to his play deck (reshuffle) during the end-of-turn phase. Discard this card when any play deck is exhausted. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Ered Laranor
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess. card.name: Followers of The Silent One

Discard this faction to take Tayb Occultist from your discard pile to your hand.Cannot not be duplicated at a given site.

card.name: Forlindaal
card.text: Unique. Maia. Playable at The Great Oasis. May play Master of Wood, Water, or Hill on his company to change a Desert [e] region to a Wilderness [w]. Refuge may be played on his company with the last region being a Desert instead of a Wilderness. tap: make Dreams of Lore playable at his current site in a Desert region until the end of the turn. Any opponent may shuffle Capricious Spirit from his sideboard to his play deck when Forlindaal enters play. Discard if he moves to a site not in the Sun-lands.

attr.value: Oasis. Corruption cards played on characters at this site affect all other characters in the company (as if played on such characters). Valour in Battle may be played at this site (without other requirements).

Oasis. Non-Nazgûl creatures keyed to this site attack normally, not as detainment. Corruption cards played on characters at this site affect all other characters in the company (as if played on such characters).

card.name: Glorin
card.text: Unique. Stiffbeard. Agent. Grey Agent.+1 prowess against Men and Orcs. Agent only: tap: discard one food item from a company at his current site (hazard player’s choice).

card.name: Glory of Bellakar
card.text: Unique. Playable if you receive the mp from Northern Bellakar and Southern Bellakar. The hazard limit against minion companies at or moving to a site in Bellakar is modified by +1 (to a minimum of 3). Additionally, all minion factions in play at sites or in regions in Bellakar or adjacent regions have their moral and force number decreased by 2. This card is worth 1 mp for each such faction of opponent you have defeated (place it with this card).

card.name: Guinarnen
card.text: Ritual. Playable during the site phase on a character at Fuinur’s Well or Deeps of Fuinur. Tap a sage in the company and invert this card: the character is considered “off to the side” at one of the above named sites; discard any allies and followers he controls. The above named sites become hidden sites; any company moving to these sites must discard a Stolen Knowledge card it controls. Any sage at the above named sites may tap during the organization phase to reinvert this card: the character joins his company. A character bearing Guinarnen receives +1 to prowess and body, +1 mind, and +2 to any rolls to remove disease and corruption cards on him.

card.text: Unique. Playable at any site in Bozisha-Miraz if the influence check is greater than 10Standard Modifications: if played at a Wondrous Maps site (+3), every diplomat in the company that taps (+2) tap: transfer a horse ally to any character in the company with a home site in the Sun-lands.

card.name: Harad
card.text: Playable during organization phase on a company moving without region cards. card.name: Lesinavi
card.text: Undead. 3 strikes. May also be played keyed to a Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] in a Desert region [e]. Any strike of Lesinavi receives +1 prowess for each defeated strike of the same attack.

card.name: Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopuses
card.graphics: Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopuses.jpg

attr.value: Animals (Octopuses) — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess; if this attack is not defeated a 2nd identical automatic- attack follows immediately.
*Opponent may discard one Watcher in the Water to give +3 prowess to the automatic-attack. Contains a hoard.

card.name: Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopuses
card.graphics: Lighthouse at the Cape of Octopuses2.jpg

attr.value: Animals (Octopuses) — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess; if the attack is not defeated a 2nd identical attack follows immediately.
*Opponent may discard one Watcher in the Water to give +3 prowess to the automatic-attack. Contains a hoard.
Items (minor, major, greater*) *—non battle gear items only—
(1st) Men — 2 strikes with 9 prowess; (2nd) Orcs — 3 strikes with 9 prowess
Men — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against black players' companies.)
Adûnaphel the Ringwraith may be brought into play at this site.
Dwarves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment; cancelled if a Dwarf with a home site in the Sun-lands is in the company)
Hidden site. A company must contain a Stiffbeard Dwarf or tap an avatar to reveal this site.
Dwarves — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess
Hidden site. Tap a Dwarf or an avatar to reveal this site.

card.name: Magurgoth
card.text: Unique. Spawn. Fire-demon. 3 strikes. Playable keyed to Bar Falin and Evefalin Cavern-system. If Doors of Night is in play may also be played keyed to any adjacent site and to Narád-dûm, Ny Chennacatt and Tartaust. If played as a permanent-event, any non- unique Orc creature may be played keyed to Yellow Mountains and its adjacent regions.

card.name: Majmun
card.text: Animals. Apes. 9 strikes. May also be played keyed to any Wilderness region [w] in the Sun-lands and to Ruins & Lairs [R] and Border-holds [B] in a Desert region [e].

attr.value: Bay of Felaya, Coast of Harad, Dune Sea, Felaya, Hyarmenfalas, Mardruak Cape
Bay of Felayia, Coast of Harad, Mardruak
Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment)
Discard an item from the company to make Wild Horses playable at the site this turn.
Men — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
If a revealed agent moves to this site, you may tap this site to take another agent action the same turn (and move two regions if moving)

card.name: Mélorak
card.text: Unique. Can use shadow-magic. tap: play Black Breath on an opponent’s non-avatar character at the same site.

card.name: Mirage
card.text: Any moving company with a Desert [e] in its site path must make a roll; subtract from this roll the number of Desert symbols in the site path and add the number of rangers in the company. If the result is less than 5, opponent may replace the company’s site with a site in the same or an adjacent region.

attr.value: Ammu Baj, Arysis, Clyan, Dune Sea, Harshandatt, Isfahan, Kirmlesra, Né Tava, Siakan
Hidden site. Tap a ranger with a home site in the Sunlands to reveal this site. *Only playable if you have less mp than all opponents.
Information, Items* (minor, major, greater) —hero items only—
Dúnedain — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
Hidden site. Tap a ranger with a home site in the Sun-lands to reveal this site. *A diplomat in the company must tap to make items playable.
Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess; Troll — 1 strike with 9 prowess
Any item discarded from a character at or moving to a site in the Sun-lands may be placed with this site (if in your location deck). Any item placed with this site is considered playable at the site.
Non-Nazgûl creatures keyed to the site attack normally, not as detainment. The first item played at the site may be taken from your discard pile.

card.name: Mûmak-helmet
card.text: Unique. Playable on Indûr the Ringwraith at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Sun-lands (does not tap the site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects Indûr; he gains the ranger skill and is not taken back to hand on a body check of 7 or 8. Opponent must reveal 1 hazard from his hand per Wilderness [w] or Jungle [j] region in his site path. When Indûr controls an Oliphant, the company is in Fell Rider mode: any character controlling a horse ally, Oliphant or Zûrafy may be in his company (and no other characters or allies). Indûr’s prowess is only modified by -1 when not tapping to face a strike.

attr.value: Animals. Undead — 4 strikes with 9 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC
Animals. Undead — 4 strikes with 9 prowess; each character wounded must make a CC

card.name: Nár's Folk
card.text: Unique. Playable at Nárad-dûm if the influence check is greater then 9.Standard Modifications: Dwarves (+2), Elves (-2), Men (+1) This faction is worth 1 extra mp (to a maximum of 3 mp) for every Dwarf-hold you have in active play in the Sun-lands and/or the Uttersouth. tap: bring one Tûr Betark from discard pile to your play deck (reshuffle).

attr.value: Hidden site. The company must contain a Dwarf or a Dwarf-friend to reveal this site. For every food item discarded (for no effect) from the company one item played here does not tap the site. Items may be played at this site from the sideboard.
Hidden site. The company must contain a Dwarf (as character or prisoner) or discard a Stolen Knowledge it controls to reveal this site.

card.name: Nazog
card.text: Unique. Half-orc. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 9. +1 EI against Orcs. +1 EI against Men with a home site in the Sun- lands. +1 prowess when in the Sun-lands. Double the bonus to EI from any trophies he bears.

attr.value: Sturlurtsa, any Orc-hold in a Desert region
Erim Póa, Isfahan, Isra, Kirmlesra, Mirror of Fire

card.name: Nehvaari
card.text: Pûkel-creature. May be played keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Sun-lands or in a Desert [e] region. Each character in the company faces one strike. His prowess against such a strike is equal to his mind. If the strike is successful the character is not wounded but he looses all skills until the end of the turn; tap character if untapped.

attr.value: Battleground. Tap a Dúnadan or Elf with a home site in the Sun-lands to make gold rings playable at the site.
Elves — 2 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment against companies containing only Elves and/or Dúnedain)

card.name: Nîlûphel
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Dúnedain with a home site in the Sun-lands. If Ûrezîr or Ûrêkhâd has been eliminated, Nîlûphel becomes a leader, and gains the warrior skill and +2 prowess.

attr.value: Hazaj Tollin, Monastery of True Faith

card.name: Northern Bellakar
card.text: Playable if you have a Dúnadan and a Man faction in play at sites in Felaya, and Engines of Defense in playat Hazaj Tollin. Opponent’s companies cannot enter Hazaj Tollin unless they move a faction to the site. This card is worth 3 mp if you have Rebuild the Town in play at Nîlûlondê and you have a Tower Raided in play at a site in Bellakar or its adjacent regions. Discard this card if you do not have a Man and a Dúnadan faction in play at sites in Felaya. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Nuluzir
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against factions playable only at sites in Bellazen, Bozisha-Miraz or Tulwang. Agent only: Pirates may be played keyed to his current Port site in the Sun-lands as if keyed to a Coastal Sea [c].

attr.value: (2) (1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Spawn — 2 strikes with 14 prowess
Akhôrahil may be played keyed to this site.
(1st) Orcs — 4 strikes with 7 prowess; (2nd) Spawn — 2 strikes with 14 prowess
*If you are Sauron or Akhôrahil all automatic-attacks are detainment against your companies. Akhôrahil the Ringwraith may be brought into play at this site.

Oasis. Lost Knowledge. Contains a hoard. A Dúnadan character at this site may tap to invertthis site. If this site is inverted you may place it with the company instead of discarding it or returning it to the location deck.

card.name: Oliphant
card.text: Animal. Playable at any Border-hold [B] in the Sun-lands or the Uttersouth at which you have a Man faction in play. Discard if bearer’s company moves through more than three regions or uses movement other than region or port movement. -2 the body of any strike (or character in CvCC) that Oliphant taps to face. Cannot be duplicated on a given character.

card.name: Ôn-Eno
card.text: Unique. Agent. +2 EI against Wose characters. +2 EI against Wose factions playable at sites in the Sun-lands. -1 to his CC if he is not at or moving to a site in the Sun-lands. Agent only: tap: take Spirit of Oku-Tori from your sideboard or discard pile to your hand.

attr.value: The Tower of Birds, Yatali Clan-hold

card.name: Ôn-Ikana
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Woses. -1 to his CC ifhe is not at or moving to a site in the Sun-lands. tap: cancel an attack keyed to a Jungle region [j] against his company.

card.name: Orcs of the Ered Harmal
card.text: Unique. Playable at Mount Arysis if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: Orcs (+2), Uruk-hai Orcs (-2) This faction is worth 1 additional mp forevery item placed with any version of Mount Arysis.

attr.value: Great Seagull is playable at this site (as if at a site in the Northern Waste).

card.name: Peshtin
card.text: Unique. +1 EI against the Clan Másra faction. You may discard Glamour of Surpassing Excellence from hand during the organization phase to force an opponent to reveal 2 hazards from his hand (or else his whole hand).

attr.value: Chelkar, Dune Sea, Haruzan, Lurmsakûn, Khand

card.name: Pharacas
card.text: Unique. Black player only. +2 EI against Dúnadan characters and factions playable in the Sun-lands.

attr.value: Hidden site. The company must contain a Wose (as character or prisoner) to reveal this site.
Hidden site. The company must contain a Wose (as character or prisoner) to reveal this site.

card.name: Quicksand
card.text: Environment. Playable on a character with a base prowess less than 4 in a company moving to a site in a non-Coastal Sea [c] region in the Sunlands or its adjacent regions. Every organization phase, make a roll and add the base prowess of every character in the company that taps; if the result is less than 15, target character may not move this turn. Discard this card when the character moves.

card.name: Razarac
card.text: Unique. Demon. Flying. 3 strikes. Playable keyed to Mirror of Fire and to non-Haven [H] sites in this region. If Drought is in play Razarac may be played keyed to any Desert [e] region. Each excessive strike modifies the defending character’s body by -1. If a company is moving through Mirror of Fire, once per movement/hazard phase you may make a roll modified by +1 for each character in the company with a home site outside of the Sun-lands; if the result is greater than 9, Razarac maybe played from the discard pile.

card.name: Ring of Elendil
card.text: Unique. Ring. Playable by a Dúnadan at a Dúnadan-hold in the Sun-lands, if you have Northern Bellakar and/or Southern Bellakar in play. Bearer becomes a leader. +5 EI against Dúnadan characters and factions playable in Eriador and/or Greater Gondor. Values in parenthesis apply if you have Tarma of Ar-Pharazôn in play, or if bearer is a Dúnadan-lord.

card.name: Rómestámo
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Pallando. White and grey player only. Playable on a non-overt company at or moving to a site in theGreat Central Plains, Sun-lands or Uttersouthp. You may play spells on the company as if on Pallando (except Sacrifice of Form; no CC required). Your rolls to remove corruption cards from Dúnadan and Man characters in the company are modified by +2. Whenever a character in your company becomes wounded or is eliminated by a body check you may bring a card from your sideboard to your play deck (or vice versa). Discard this card when Pallando enters play or you have 10 or more P. Invert this card during your untap phase; if inverted, discard this card at the end of the turn.

card.name: Sakalthôr
card.text: Unique. Agent. Grey Agent. +2 EI against factions playable only at sites in Bellazen, Felaya or Bozisha-Miraz. -1 to all of his CC. Agent only: Politics may be played on any Dúnadan character at his current site in the company with a character with a higher mind (as if an avatar).

card.name: Sakalure
card.text: Unique. Can use spirit-magic.

card.name: Sand Devil
card.text: Undead. 2 strikes. If Sand-storm is in play may also be played keyed to any region in the Sun-lands and adjacent regions and Sand Devil may be played from the discard pile. Any character facing a strike whose mind is lower than the prowess of Sand Devil must tap following the strike (unless the strike is cancelled).

card.name: Sand-drake
card.text: Drake. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defendingcharacters. May also be played keyed to any Desert [e] region in the Sun-lands. If Doors of Night is in play, may also be played keyed to Bozisha-Miraz, Chelkar, Harondor, Hyarmenfalas, Khand, Lurmsakûn and Mardruak.

card.name: Sand-storm
card.text: Environment. Each moving company with at least 2 Deserts [e] in its site path must return to their site of origin, unless it contains a ranger with a home site in the Sun-lands. Additionally, if Drought is in play any non-Haven [H,K] site in play with at least 2 Deserts in its site path is tapped. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Sangahyando
card.text: Unique. Can use shadow-magic. +2 EI against Dúnedain. If he is at Angamaitë’s site of departure, you may wound Sangahyando to cancel an attack against Angamaitë’s company (no body check required).

card.name: Savgak
card.text: Unique. Uruk-hai. Leader. Discard on a body check result of 8. +2 EI against Orcs with a lower mind and prowess. +1 prowess against Dwarves and Men.

card.name: Sea-blockade
card.text: Playable on a port. No port movement to or from the port is allowed. No company moving to or from the port may include a coastal sea [c] in its site path, even starter movement to the port is prevented, if starter movement includes a coastal sea. Discard this card if the port leaves active play. Cannot be duplicated on a given site.

card.name: Sea-helm of Ciryatan
card.text: Unique. Playable on The Witch-king at any non-Free-hold [F] site in the Sun-lands, or at Lond Daer (does not tapthe site). Cannot be transferred. This item affects The Witch-king; he gains the ranger skill and is not taken back to hand on a body check of 7. All your Dúnadan characters cost 1 less influence to control. If a spell targets his company make a roll: if the result is greater than 6, the effects of the spell for your company are cancelled.tap: take Black Sails or a character manifestation of Adûnaphel or Akhôrahil from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Seafaring Bellakarin
card.text: Dúnedain. Men. 4 strikes. May be played keyed to Bay of Felaya, Bay of Tulwang, Bellazen, Coast of Harad, Felaya and Mardruak Cape, and to sites in these regions. May also be played keyed to Port sites in Bozisha-Miraz, Harondor, Hyarmenfalas, Mardruak and Tulwang. Detainment against hero companies and non overt companies containing neither Men nor Dúnedain.

card.name: Seawarden's Realm
card.text: Unique. Black player only. Playable on Pharacas or a War-lord, if at a site in Bellakar or its adjacent regions and you have Black Númenoreans in play. If on Pharacas he becomes a War-lord. Rotate this card 90° each time opponent has to discard Northern Bellakar or Southern Bellakar from play, or when you seize a Port site. This card is worth 1 mp for each time rotated.

attr.value: Bozisha-Miraz, Chennacatt, Curinshiban, Tulwang, Yellow Mountains, Zajantak
Arysis, Clyan, Ered Harmal, Mirror of Fire

card.name: Slave-trader
card.text: Playable on a Man or Half-orc character with a home site in Mordor, the Great Central Plains, the Sun- lands or the Utter-south. If target character is at a site in the same territory as one of his home sites where a character is held prisoner by a hazard host, he may tap (or discard a treasure item from the company) to cancel all rescue attacks and take this character Prisoner with your company. The Prisoner may be stored at any Port site. This card is worth 1 mp if you have a Prisoners stored at a Port site.

card.name: Sloth Bear
card.text: Animal. Bear. 1 strike. Playable keyed to any Wilderness [w] adjacent to a Desert [e] region, or to any Desert adjacent to a Wilderness region. If Sloth Bear’s attack or any of its strikes are cancelled, it may be played again from the discard pile against the same company this turn.

card.name: Sorcerer-king of Mûmakan
card.text: Place this card on Indûr the Ringwraith if in play as yourRingwraith; he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Amaru; Indûr gains this site as a home site. tap: and discard a sorcery card from hand to wound a character at a site in his current region; if the body check is not successful, wound Indûr. You may not engage in CvCC this turn.Discard this card to take Mûmak-helmet from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Sorijan Raiders
card.text: Men. 3 strikes. May be played keyed to Bay of Felaya, Bay of Tulwang, Bellazen, Kurryan Bay,Tulwang, and to sites in these regions. May also be played keyed to a Port site Bozisha-Miraz, Felaya and Mardruak. This creature is considered an asterix (*) creature if the company it faces has already faced an attack by Seafaring Bellakarin this movement/hazard phase.

card.name: Southern Bellakar
card.text: Playable if you have a Dúnadan and a Man faction in play at sites in Bellazen, and Engines of Defense in play at Korlea. Opponent’s companies cannot enter Korlea, unless they move a faction to the site. This card is worth 3 mp if you have Ring of Elendil in play and a Dreams of Lore under Well of Ladnoca. Discard this card if you do not have a Man and a Dúnadan faction in play at Korlea. Cannot be duplicated.

card.name: Southron Scimitar
card.text: Playable only in the Sunlands. Weapon. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+3 prowess if bearer has a home site in the Sunlands) to a maximum of 8.

card.name: Spirit of Oku-Tori
card.text: Unique. Manifestation of Tica the Birdman. For every character moving through Suza Sumar the hazard player makes a roll; place this card with the first character whose mind is lower than the result: the character is taken prisoner at The Tower of Birds (discard any allies he controls). Any company entering this site faces an attack (after all automatic-attacks): Animal — 1 strike with the prisoner’s normal prowess +7. If this attack is defeated the character is released (no body checks are required; discard this card). Otherwise the hazard player may opt to transfer this card to a character that has received a strike (instead of making a body check). This character then becomes the prisoner (eliminate the former prisoner).

card.name: Staff of Medra
card.text: Unique. Staff. Playable at Tûl Isra. +2 EI against Men with a home site in Isra or its adjacent regions. Bearer may automatically influence the Clan Masrá faction. tap: cancel the effects of Sandstorm for bearer’s company. tap: take Sandstorm from your discard pile to your hand.Bearer makes a CC modified by -2 when this item becomes tapped.

card.name: Storm King of Ciryatandor
card.text: Place this card on Akhôrahil the Ringwraith if in play as your Ringwraith: he becomes a War-lord and a leader. You may play this card in lieu of a minor item in your starting company and start the game at Ny Chennacatt; Akhôrahil gains this site as a home site. Akhôrahil may tap to take Ill East Wind from your sideboard to your hand. Discard this card to take Eyes of the Well from your discard pile to your hand. Cannot be duplicated.

attr.value: (1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Undead — 1 strike with 11 prowess
(1st) Traps — 3 strikes with 8 prowess; (2nd) Undead — 1 strike with 11 prowess

card.name: Sud Sicanna
card.text: Unique. Undead. 1 strike. May be played keyed to Isfahan, Kes Arik, and to sites in these regions. May also be played on a company containing Travelling Merchants moving through a Desert [e] region. Any wounded character must make a CC; any character failing this check splits off from the company and immediately returns to his site of origin.

attr.value: Spider (Scorpion) — 1 strike with 6 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters). Characters may not tap to give +1 prowess to another character in their company against this attack. Any resulting body checks are modified by +2.

Spider (Scorpion) — 1 strike with 6 prowess (attacker chooses defending characters). Characters may not tap to give +1 prowess to another character in their companyagainst this attack. Any resulting body checks are modified by +2.
Bay of Tulwang, Bellazen, Bozisha-Miraz, Isfahan, Kes Arik

card.name: Swamp-dragon
card.text: Animal. 1 strike. Playable keyed to any Oasisor Swamp (except in the Northern Waste) site and to any Coastal Sea [c] region in Bay of Ormal, Sun-lands, Seven lands and Uttersouth. May also be played on a company using Port-on-River movement, or if Anduin River or The Undeeps of Anduin was played. Attacker chooses defending characters. +3 prowess against, Dwarves, Hobbits, Wose and non-uruk-hai Orcs.

card.name: Tabaya Kas
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against characters and factions playable in Isra and its adjacent regions.+2 EI against the Clan Másra faction.

card.name: Tarma of Ar-Pharazôn
card.text: Unique. Playable at Umbar if you have a manifestation of Black Númenoreans in play. If you are a hero player your influence attempts against non-overt minion resources do no suffer a -5 modification. If you are a minion player your influence attempts by characters in a covert company against hero resources do not suffer a -5 modification. Discard if you do not have Black Númenoreans in play.

card.name: Tartas Izain
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Clan Bulgan faction. If you are Akhôrahil he can use spirit-magic.

attr.value: Men — each character faces a strike with 9 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Tarvaran
card.text: Unique. +2 prowess if you have Cult of Vatra in play.

card.name: Tavir, the Y'shar
card.text: Unique. Maia. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defender characters. May also be played keyed to any Ruins & Lairs [R] in Suza Sumar. As a short event, tap up to two non-Elf, non-overts character at or moving to a Ruins & Lairs [R] in the Sun-lands.

card.name: Tayb Occultist
card.text: Slayer. 1 strike. Playable keyed to any Border-hold [B] or Shadow-hold [S] in the Sun-lands. Only playable against white and grey player’s companies. Attacker chooses defending non-avatar characters (shuffle Tayb Occultist into your play deck if a strike is redirected to an avatar). For each succcesfull strike you may choose to modifiy the resulting body check by +1 or place a Disease card from your hand or discard pile on the wounded character. This creature’s body is modified by +2 for every Followers of The Silent One in play.

card.name: Tears of Ladnoca
card.text: Playable if Hidden Waters of Harad is rotated 360. Moon is considered a permanent-event. Discard Cult of Vatra if in play. You may discard this card to discard one Sand-storm or Drought from play.

card.name: Tedjin
card.text: Unique. Playable at a site in Dune Sea or Kes Arik if the influnece check is greater than 8This faction is worth 2 mp if you have a horse or camel faction in play. tap: make Brigands playable keyed to a Desert [e] region with +1 to prowess and strikes this turn.

attr.value: (1st) Rock-fall — each character faces a strike with 7 prowess; (2nd) Opponent may play as an automatic-attack a non- unique Undead or Pûkel-man creature from his hand.
Desert Amber may be always be played at this site and may be taken from the discard pile or sideboard.

Hidden site. Oasis. When this site is revealed, make a roll modified by the number of site cards in your discard pile which have a Desert [e] in their site path; if the result is less than 10 you must choose and move to another site in a Desert region.
(1st) Elves — 4 strikes with 10 prowess; (2nd) Maia — 1 strike with 15 prowess —cannot be cancelled—

Hidden site. Oasis. When this site is revealed, makea roll modified by the number of site cards in your discard pile which have a Desert [e] in their site path; if the result is less than 10 you must choose and move to another site in a Desert [e] region.
Tap this site during the site phase to heal all characters in the company (from wounded to tapped).
Men—each character faces 1 strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)
tap the site during the site phase to heal all characters in the company (from wounded to tapped).

card.name: The Sea Is Unrelenting
card.text: Playable on an attack by a creature keyed toa Coastal Sea [c]. If the attack or any of its strikes are cancelled, wound one character in the company (attacker’s choice; no body check required). Additionally, the hazard limit against the company is increased by one for each Coastal Sea [Cc] in its site path.

card.name: The Southern Hammer
card.text: Unique. Weapon. Playable at Evefalin Cavern-systems. Two-handed. Warrior only: +2 prowess (+4 if bearer is a Dwarf) to a maximum of 9. This item gives 3 CP to a Dwarf bearer, and 5 mp if stored at a Dwarf-hold in the Sun-lands. tap: take a strike a Dwarf in the company is facing.

attr.value: Hidden site. The company must either contain a Wose (as character or prisoner) or tap a ranger with a home site in the Sun-lands when this site is revealed.
Hidden site. The company must either contain a Wose (as character or prisoner) or tap a ranger with a home site in the Sun-lands when this site is revealed.

card.name: Tica the Birdman
card.text: Unique. Maia. Flying. Playable at The Tower of Birds by a Wose or a character with at least 7 prowess, after defeating Spirit of Oku-Tori’s associated attack. Place this card with the Prisoner who now becomes an ally with a normal prowess +7; invert him if unwounded, you may transfer any items he controls. tap: shuffle Hidden Ways from your discard pile into your play deck. If Hidden Ways is played on a ranger in the company, creatures may also not be played keyed to Jungle [j] regions.

attr.value: Creatures keyed to Coastal Sea [c] played against a company moving to this site attack with +2 prowess.
Creatures keyed to Coastal Sea [c] played against a company moving to this site attack with +2 prowess.

Tap a ranger during the organization phase to search your discard pile or sideboard for a character and bring him into play at this site; the character comes into play wounded, tap the site if untapped. Alternatively, any character taken Prisoner while at or moving to a site in the Sun-lands or its adjacent regions may be taken Prisoner at this site. A ranger may tap during the site phase at this site to release any character taken Prisoner at a site in the Sun-lands or its adjacent regions (he joins the rangers company).

Tap a ranger during the organization phase to search you discard pile or sideboard for a character and bring him into play at this site; the character comes into play wounded, tap the site if untapped. Alternatively, any character taken Prisoner while at or moving to a site in the Sun-lands or its adjacent regions may be taken Prisoner at this site. A ranger may tap during the site phase at this site to release any character taken Prisoner at a site in the Sun-lands or its adjacent regions (he joins the rangers company).

card.name: Travelling Merchants
card.text: Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Shadow-hold [S] site in a Desert [e] region if the influence check is greater than 6Standard Modifications: character with a home site in the Sun-lands (+2) This faction must be placed with the company; it is worth 1 mp if stored at Border-hold [B] in the Sun-lands (except the site where it was played). If a company is at such a site, you may discard this faction to make information playable there and take one information resource from your discard pile to your hand.

Men — each character faces a strike with 5 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

card.name: Tûr Betark
card.text: Playable at the end of the organization phase on a company containing a ranger. If the company moves with region movement, tap a ranger to move as if the following pairs of regions were adjacent: Chennacatt and Dûshera, Isra and Dûshera, Chennacatt and Gan, Isra and Gan, Sára Bask and Gan. The company faces an attack at the beginning of its movement/hazard phase: Orcs — 3 strikes with 7 prowess. Alternatively, if the site moved to is in one of the regions listed above, the hazard limit is reduced by 2 (to a minimum of 2). Cannot be duplicated on a given company.

attr.value: Men — 3 strikes with 8 prowess (detainment if the company does not contain Elves)
Port. If a hero faction is in play at Umbar (and no minion faction) all versions of the site become a Free-hold [F]; all automatic-attacks become non-detainment against minion companies.
Men — each character faces a strike with 8 prowess (detainment against covert companies)

Port. Umbarean Corsairs faction is playable at this site. If a minion faction is in play at Umbar (and no hero faction) all versions of the site become a Shadow-hold [S]; all automatic-attacks are non-detainment against hero companies.

card.name: Ûrêkhâd
card.text: Unique. +2 EI if he bears a unique battle-gear item. +1 prowess if at or moving to a Port or Battleground site.

attr.value: Port. A sage at this site may tap to discard one non-environment hazard event that mentions Coastal Sea [c] in the card text.
(1st) Men — each character faces a strike with 6 prowess (detainment against covert companies) (2nd) Dúnedain — 3 strikes with 10 prowess (against overt companies only)

card.name: Ûrezîr
card.text: Unique. +2 EI against Dúnedain with a home site in the Sun-lands. +1 prowess against Men. +1 prowess in CvCC if your opponent is Sauron.

attr.value: When Doors of Night is in play, this site is considered a Shadow-hold [S].
When Doors of Night is in play, this site is considered a Shadow-hold [S].

card.name: Uvag-aak
card.text: Animals. Apes. 2 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played keyed to Sára Bask, Suza Sumar and Ûsakan and to non-Haven [H] sites in these regions. Each character wounded by Uvag-aak has his body modified by -1 until the end of the turn.

card.name: Vaal Gark
card.text: Unique. Half-elf. Desert-screamer. Agent. Grey Agent. +2 EI against the Desert Screamers faction. You may play Counterfeit on Vaal Gark without any requirements (also as a hero resource): during the untap phase you may choose for Vaal Gark to be either a Dúnadan, Elf or Man for the effects of non-enviroment hazards and non-item resources. Agent only: tap: at a company’s new site in a Desert [e] region to attack that company during its movement/hazard phase with +2 prowess.

attr.value: any Haven site in the Sun-lands
Undead — 3 strikes with 10 prowess —cannot be cancelled—
Undead — 3 strikes with 10 prowess —cannot be cancelled—

card.name: Vaurak
card.text: Unique. Sand-drake. 3 strikes. Attacker chooses defending characters. May also be played keyed to Dune Sea and Mirror of Fire, and to regions adjacent to these if Doors of Night is in play.

card.name: Vísi
card.text: Unique. Playable at Bozisha-Dar if the influence check is greater than 9.Standard Modifications: overt characters (-4), Leader, Lord or War-lord (+3) Bodyguard may be played as a minion character. After a successful influence attempt against this faction you may bring one Bodyguard into play from your sideboard under control of the character that has made the influence attempt. If you don’t have a Bodyguard in play, Bodyguard may be brought into play at Bozisha-dar.This faction is worth 3 mp to a non-black player.

card.name: Vuk
card.text: Animals. Wolves. 7 strikes. May be played keyed to any region in the Sun-lands and regions adjacent to these (may not be keyed to Jungle [j] and Coastal Sea [c] regions).

card.name: Vultures
card.text: Animals. Two attacks; each wounded character faces a strike. A character in the company may tap to cancel one of these attacks. All body checks resulting from successful strikes are modified by +1. May also be keyed to regions in Mordor and to any Ruins & Lairs [R] in a Desert [e] region. If Drought is in play may also be keyed to any region adjacent to a Desert region.

card.name: Well of Junast
card.text: Unique. Playable at Tresti. You may take this card from your sideboard to your hand if Hidden Waters of Harad is in play. If in play as a hero resource you may store Dreams of Lore at Tresti and place it with this card; any player may discard a Vile Fumes from a company at Tresti to discard one Dreams of Lore from this card. If in play as a minon resource you may store Vile Fumes at Tresti and place it with this card; any player may discard a Dreams of Lore from a company at Tresti to discard one Vile Fumes from this card. This card is worth 1 mp for each card stored with it.

attr.value: Bosiri, Chennacatt, Curinshiban, Hyarn, Seznebab, Ûsakan
Bosiri, Chennacatt, Dûshera, Gan, Isra, Sára Bask
Bay of Tulwang, Bozisha-Miraz, Curinshiban, Seznebab, Tulwang

card.name: Zohkad
card.text: Unique. +1 prowess when at or moving to asite in a Coastal Sea [c] region or a Port.-1 to his CC.

card.name: Zûrafy
card.text: Animal. Playable at any tapped or untapped non-Haven [H, K] site in a Desert [e] region. When moving through a Desert [e] region, each Zûrafy in the company increases the maximum number of regions the company may move by 1 (to a maximum of 4). tap: cancel a strike from a non-automatic-attack against itself. tap: during CvCC to tap all non-unique horse allies in opponent’s company.
